history.proof: destruct prod_AbelianGroup as [H1 [H2 H3]]. - sauto l: on depth: 3use: is_linear. - sauto l: on depth: 3use: is_linear. - srun best use: Rlt_0_1, Rmult_1_l, @Build_is_linear unfold: Rle.

original: unfold is_linear. intros. destruct l as [H1 [H2 H3]]. split. - intros x y. rewrite H1. reflexivity. - split. + intros k x. rewrite H2. reflexivity. + destruct H3 as [M [H4 H5]]. exists M. split. * apply H4. * intros x. specialize (H5 x). apply H5.
